sentence.Network_en: The Daily Mail has the headline "The Voice of Conscience"
sentence.Network_cn: 《每日邮报》的头版标题为“良知的声音”。

sentence.Network_en: I'm so glad he had a pang of conscience.
sentence.Network_cn: 我很高兴他会有负疚感。

sentence.Network_en: I would like your advice on a matter of conscience, Father.
sentence.Network_cn: 我想就一件有关良心的事征求您的建议，神父。

list.abs: ... 30．头痛得快炸了 a splitting headache 31．受到良心的谴责 get one's conscience smitten 33．垂头丧气 sing the blues.
sooner or later , you'll get your conscience smitten .总有一天，你会受到良心的谴责。
his conscience smitten him , and he has repented in deep sincerity .他自己的良心谴责了他，他真诚的深深的忏悔。

auth_sentence.content: "Refugee" is Dido with a political conscience.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "Refugee" is Dido with a political conscience.

auth_sentence.content: Nets that entangle the...silken wings of a tender conscience.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nets that entangle the...silken wings of a tender conscience.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nets that entangle the...silken wings of a tender conscience.

auth_sentence.content: The bailiff had squared his conscience...according to the law.
auth_sentence.res_content: The bailiff had squared his conscience...according to the law.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The bailiff had squared his conscience...according to the law.
